App.name: PhotoPrism
App.description: PhotoPrismÂ® is an AI-Powered Photos App for the Decentralized Web. It makes use of the latest technologies to tag and find pictures automatically without getting in your way. You can run it at home, on a private server, or in the cloud.

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_ADMIN_PASSWORD
environment.description: YOUR INITIAL ADMIN PASSWORD (MINIMUM 8 CHARACTERS, USERNAME admin)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_SITE_URL
environment.description: public server URL incl http:// or https:// and /path, :port is optional

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_ORIGINALS_LIMIT
environment.description: file size limit for originals in MB (increase for high-res video)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_HTTP_COMPRESSION
environment.description: improves transfer speed and bandwidth utilization (none or gzip)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_LOG_LEVEL
environment.description: log level: trace, debug, info, warning, error, fatal, or panic

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_PUBLIC
environment.description: no authentication required (disables password protection)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_READONLY
environment.description: do not modify originals directory (reduced functionality)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_EXPERIMENTAL
environment.description: enables experimental features

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_CHOWN
environment.description: disables storage permission updates on startup

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_WEBDAV
environment.description: disables built-in WebDAV server

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_SETTINGS
environment.description: disables settings UI and API

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_TENSORFLOW
environment.description: disables all features depending on TensorFlow

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_FACES
environment.description: disables facial recognition

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_CLASSIFICATION
environment.description: disables image classification

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DISABLE_RAW
environment.description: disables indexing and conversion of RAW files

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_RAW_PRESETS
environment.description: enables applying user presets when converting RAW files (reduces performance)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_JPEG_QUALITY
environment.description: image quality, a higher value reduces compression (25-100)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DETECT_NSFW
environment.description: flag photos as private that MAY be offensive (requires TensorFlow)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_UPLOAD_NSFW
environment.description: allows uploads that MAY be offensive

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DATABASE_DRIVER
environment.description: use MariaDB 10.5+ or MySQL 8+ instead of SQLite for improved performance

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DATABASE_SERVER
environment.description: MariaDB or MySQL database server (hostname:port)

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DATABASE_NAME
environment.description: MariaDB or MySQL database schema name

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DATABASE_USER
environment.description: MariaDB or MySQL database user name

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_DATABASE_PASSWORD
environment.description: MariaDB or MySQL database user password

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_SITE_DESCRIPTION
environment.description: meta site description

environment.name: PHOTOPRISM_SITE_AUTHOR
environment.description: meta site author

volumes.description: *writable* storage folder for cache, database, and sidecar files (never remove)
